English: FORWARD, COMRADES! FOR THE SOVIET UNION, ATTACK!
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY HAS AN ANTI-AIR GUN AROUND THE AIRPORT. ONCE YOU GET THERE, TAKE CARE OF IT, OTHERWISE ULYANA WON'T BE ABLE TO SUPPORT YOU FROM THE AIR. BAZA OUT.
WE'VE BROKEN THEIR LINE OF DEFENCE. CONTINUE TO THE CITY AND SEIZE IT.
SAINT PHILLIPPE IS OURS, COMRADES. TO ALL UNITS, ASSUME DEFENSIVE POSITIONS AND GET READY FOR ENEMY COUNTERATTACKS. I'M TAKING LEONID TO THE EAST.
LEONID TO IVAN, WE'VE TAKEN SAINT PHILLIPPE, GET READY TO STRIKE AT THE BASE, OVER.
IVAN TO LEONID, WE'RE APPROACHING FROM THE SOUTH. GIVE US THE SIGNAL AND WE'LL ATTACK. OUT.
LEONID TO IVAN, TIME TO GO IN. WEAPONS FREE, OVER.
SEE YOU IN THE BASE, LEONID. OUT.
Comment: FORTIFY THE SOUTHERN ROAD. WE'LL REARM AND GO NORTH. OUT."

English: LEONID TO ULYANA, YELENA AND FYODOR, GET READY, WE'RE ADVANCING FROM THE SOUTH TOWARDS THE AIRPORT. OUR ATTACK SHALL BEGIN SHORTLY. OVER.
ULYANA TO LEONID, DO NOT FORGET ABOUT THE ANTI-AIR GUN. WE CANNOT RISK COMING NEAR THE AIRPORT UNTIL YOU DEAL WITH THEM. OVER.
YELENA TO LEONID, WE'VE SECURED A BEACHHEAD. READY TO ADVANCE ON YOUR SIGNAL. OUT.
FYODOR TO LEONID, WE'RE ENGAGING THE ENEMY AT THE CHAPEL. WE SHOULD BE READY IN TIME FOR YOUR SIGNAL. OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, WATCH OUT FOR THAT ANTI-AIR GUN, IT HAS POTENTIAL TO TEAR YOU TO SHREDS. WE SUGGEST YOU TAKE CARE OF IT OR AT LEAST LOCATE IT BEFORE ATTACKING THE AIRPORT. BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO YELENA, FYODOR AND ULYANA, IT IS TIME TO TAKE THE AIRPORT. ONWARDS! OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ANTI-AIR GUN AT THE AIRPORT HAS BEEN NEUTRALIZED. ULYANA IS NOW ABLE TO JOIN IN ON THE ATTACK. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED, THE AIRPORT IS OURS. THE RECONQUEST OF EVERON HAS BEGUN AND YOU DID YOUR PART. GOOD WORK, EVERYONE. BAZA OUT.
